data.title: Thunderbird Community Centre
data.meta_description: The Thunderbird Community Centre is located at 2311 Cassiar St, Vancouver, BC. 604-713-1818. Amenities include a fitness centre, gym, games room, computer lab, and playground.
data.text:
Thunderbird Community Centre — located next to Thunderbird Elementary School near East Broadway and Rupert St — has programs for all ages.

Activities and facilities include childcare, a playground, a games room, computer lab, multi-purpose rooms, and a fitness centre.

Register for recreation programs and services

If you are a new user, setting up your account is easy with an email address. Just create a password, complete your profile, and you’re ready to go.

Make your online registration experience more enjoyable. Get registration tips.

Hours, location, contact info

Get Thunderbird Community Centre, Fitness Centre, and office hours. Find out where we are located and how to contact us.

Thunderbird Fitness Centre

Thunderbird Fitness Centre has cardio and strength training machines, indoor bicycles, free weights, and training props.

Room rentals

Thunderbird Community Centre has a variety of spaces to suit your needs: wedding, corporate function, meeting or other event.

Thunderbird Neighbourhood Association

The Thunderbird Community Centre is jointly operated by the Vancouver Park Board and the Thunderbird Neighbourhood Association (TNA).

The TNA is an elected, volunteer board that works to provide educational, cultural, recreational, and social service programs to the Thunderbird community area.

About the Thunderbird Neighbourhood Association External website, opens in new tab
